title: Why do we need to learn? - Quora

response.answer_text: Survival of fittest has been the norm of nature. And so the earlier being learned to make weapons and invented fire just to battle the harsh conditions. As the human evolved, he became curious and curiosity is the biggest motivation behind learning. The norm of survival of the fittest was now forgotten. It is the age of Thrival Of Smartest. So in order to cope up with the modern world, something called basic education was introduced in the world. This was more of a necessities to cope up with the world. So when you learn you upgrade yourself in this world and become more worthy and the survival becomes easier.

Life is learning. Your world continually expands, from womb size to universe and beyond size. You learn slices of it at a time and a lifespan isn't long enough to learrn it all. When we limit ourselves, preferring to live in a box, we aren't living at all.
